column5: Great inexpensive underwater camera check out www3.sympatico.ca/trophyfishcam

Has anyone seen or used this system? I have seen this same kind of add on other boards but nobody can tell me how well it works,other than the people that are selling the system. Any advice or comments?Dand

I looked at the specifications on this unit and they seem comparible to some of the other products out there. From what I can see the savings you are seeing are the "toolbox" like case instead of the waterproof case as well as the marketing expense associated with the Aqua-Vu type packages. There also may be a quality type issue on the way the camera attaches to the video/power cable. At $320 Canadian, which includes shipping, you are looking at $210-$215. It is also availble on Ebay and you might save a few dollars there if they want to move some of these units.
how can i find this on ebay
Go to Ebay. At the top of the page is a search area. Type in "trophyfishcam" and then search.
Anybody ever have any luck with their underwater camera in Canada?
